lines.text:
[Dick and Jane are robbing the phone company as the customers cheer]
Someone's robbing the phone company. Bless you.

[pointing a gun at Dr. Will]
Stick 'em up!
Did I hear you right, sinner? Are you holding me up?
Interesting that the only two jobs you think I am qualified for are a secretary and a prostitute.
You're not qualified to be a secretary.

[at the unemployment office]
Look what your card says, Aerospace Executive.
Yeah, but I'm not that anymore.
In here, man, you are what you were.
What kind of lunatic spends $1000 on lunch when he's out of a job and deeply in debt?
The kind that knows you can't get a job if you look like a loser.
If I was Diners Club, I'd your stomach bronzed and put it in the Hall of Fame.
Do you mind if I kiss you in a public place?
I'd mind if you kissed me in a private place with all these people around.
